title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Terror Targets in Southern Lebanon: Inside the Successful Operations of Unit 869”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Military buildings where terrorists were present; IDF forces attacked Hezbollah’s terror targets in southern Lebanon

Troops from Unit 869 identified earlier today terrorists entering a military building in the Marun al-Ras area. A short time after the identification, Air Force combat aircraft attacked the building where the terrorists were located, alongside another military building of the organization in the Mis al-Jabal area in southern Lebanon.

Yesterday, artillery fire was carried out to neutralize a threat in the Maroun Al Ras area.

Earlier today, Air Defense fighters successfully intercepted a suspicious aerial target that was heading towards Israel from Lebanese territory.

Attached is footage from the attacks: https://bit.ly/4btPwRX
